name: Exemplar
description:
Just a simple hack and slash endless game that gets progressively harder.

Controls:

arrow for left and right

z = attack

x = jump

space = roll(You don't take damage while rolling)

c = dash(You use this to avoid getting hit but you take damage when you pass through the enemies)

v = slide(You take damage when you pass through the enemies but you also deal damage when you slide)

Try to combine these to make your own cool combos.

:)

All the assets I used:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/piano-works/tsuneni/https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-characterhttps://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasyhttps://szadiart.itch.io/2d-soulslike-character

Libraries I used:

https://github.com/rxi/flux/

Special thank you to all these people for the awesome assets and the awesome flux library :)
